author: Reuters Editorial
title: Italy's Carel IPO book covered: source
text:
MILAN (Reuters) - The book for the initial public offering of Italy’s Carel has already been covered, a source with knowledge of the matter said on Wednesday.
Earlier this month Carel, which makes air conditioning and refrigeration control systems, set its IPO price range at 6.7-7.8 euros per share.
The company expects to debut on the Milan market in the first half of June.
Reporting by Elisa Anzolin, writing by Stephen Jewkes
